testcase.name: Successful login with Valid Credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User navigate to the login page.......................................passed When User enters valid credentials..........................................passed Then User should be on the login page.......................................passed Then I should see a message saying "Logged In Successfully".................passed And I should see the Log out button.........................................passed

testcase.name: Login Un-successful with Invalid Username
testcase.system-out: Given User navigate to the login page.......................................passed When User enters Invalid Username and Valid Password........................passed Then Login Error message is displayed and message is "Your username is invalid!".passed

testcase.name: Login Un-successful with Invalid Password
testcase.system-out: Given User navigate to the login page.......................................passed When User enters valid Username and invalid Password........................passed Then Login Error message is displayed and message is "Your password is invalid!".passed
